author: .vbuterin
content: I have a new account abstraction proposal:

author: .vbuterin
content: The key difference here is that this does NOT propose any changes to the existing ethereum consensus protocol

author: .vbuterin
content: Instead, it proposes the creation of a new alternate mempool that miners (or just flashbots relayers) could opt into

author: .vbuterin
content: Where that mempool, instead of propagating transactions, just propagates `UserOperation` objects that represent calls

author: .vbuterin
content: I feel like the template needs to be refined and improved a lot, but imo it doesn't have to be perfect; we could start just by whitelisting a few multisig and/or social recovery wallets
